Captain Bathis:

Don't worry. I'll give you several advices. Follow them and you'll becoma an experienced adventurer really fast.

First of all you have to learn some important and useful features that will help you in the nearest future. Press Tab or Alt+V to open your Inventory.
Equip the weapons and armor you need if you haven't done it already.
You can open the Skill List by pressing Alt+K. If you changed class, you will see new skills that you can learn here as well. To learn skills you need to spend a certain amount of SP. Also you learn new skills using Spellbooks and Amulets.
Besides I recommend you become familiar with automatic hunting option. But if you're sure you know all of the things, we can skip the tutorial and just go on.
